segments.text: It's almost Christmas . What are you doing this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nothing special , just working . Why do you ask ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I still haven't finished my Christmas shopping . Do you want to go shopping with me this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to , but I'm not sure if I can . Work has been really busy lately . Why don't we go on Friday instead ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Friday's not good . I think the stores will be very crowded and I have to work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , then let's try to go this weekend . I should know if I can go by Friday . Is it OK if I call you then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 233-331-8828 . Let me give you my email address too . It's Tom861@gmail.com
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I'll talk to you soon .
segments.speaker: S2
